resources.string:
Harvest Scan is a mobile application with the main feature of scanning plant leaves to identify diseases and provide treatment options. 

Simply click the scan menu, capture an image directly through the camera app, or choose an existing photo from your gallery. Once you've selected your image, hit the "analyze" button to have Harvest Scan identify the plant disease and provide recommendations for treatment. 

Harvest Scan also allows you to create a personalized plant list and set reminders to ensure your precious greenery thrives. 

Scan Your Plants To Save Your Plants!

A fungal disease causing dark, velvety spots on leaves.
Use fungicides and resistant varieties to manage apple scab.
A fungal disease that causes black, rotten spots on apples.
Remove and destroy infected fruits and use fungicides.

Remove infected leaves and use fungicides.
